name: ONU Colegial
shortDescription: United Nations simulation for Colégio Antônio Vieira students.
description: ONU Colegial is a annual United Nations simulation project, organized by the students of the "Colégio Antônio Vieira", with more than 200 participants.
In 2023, I became director of the logistics team, which I was part in 2022. I was responsible for managing the team and developed our own event credential system.
Currently, I'm responsible for all digital infrastructure and software design and development for the event.

name: ONU Intercolegial
shortDescription: Brazilian nationwide United Nations simulation project.
description: ONU Intercolegial is a Brazilain nationwide United Nations simulation project organized by students from "Rede Jesuíta de Educação", bringing together more than 200 students from more than 10 schools.

I was primarily responsible for the digital infrastructure and the software design and development for the event. I worked on projects such as the main event website, a custom system for form creation and management, API development, and the credential system.

name: Sagaz Club
shortDescription: First iteration of the Sagaz's gaming tournament platform.
description: Sagaz Club is a gaming community that organizes tournaments with cash prizes/rewards. I was responsible, as a contractor/freelancer, for the development and design of the first version of an in-house platform that allowed the organization of public tournaments with Discord integration.

name: Core das Antigas
shortDescription: Discord bot for the brazilian content creator Core das Antigas.
description: The Discord server of content creator Core das Antigas has more than 65,000 members and since 2018, uses a fun bot that allows the community to play different chat challenges.

In 2022, the team responsible for managing the server approached me with a desire to revamp the bot. The bot was rewritten using more modern tecnologies and with a better architecture, allowing easier maintenance and future improvements, plus more stability.

name: Ritsu
shortDescription: Discord Bot based on the AnimeMusicQuiz (AMQ) game.
description: A Discord Bot based on the AnimeMusicQuiz (AMQ) game, play using your MAL/Anilist animelist and with different game modes!

Built in 2020 as a toy project with some friends, shutdown and archived in 2021. Grew up to 1,000+ Discord servers. I made a lot of architecture mistakes and also learned a bunch of things while making this.

name: sazztv
shortDescription: Live streaming video platform inspired by Twitch.
description: Live streaming video platform inspired by Twitch. Developed using Golang with the Echo framework for the backend and Sveltekit for the frontend.
The RTMP protocol was used for video streaming, ensuring compatibility with streaming programs like OBS Studio.

name: nazuna
shortDescription: CLI tool to download Twitter videos using the terminal.
description: CLI tool to download Twitter videos using the terminal.
Developed with Rust, using Github Actions to automatically compile the executables for each supported platform (MacOS, Windows and Linux) every time there was a new release.
